page.title: 09FOOTPATHS AROUND SHAWBURY
page.content: The{footpaths}were used for people who went to{work,}for children going to{school,}and for people going to { {church}. There used to be many footpaths in this area but they got grown over, stiles fell down and the signs got broken and were never mended.This happened because the paths were not being used any more.People went around in{cars. The footpath that goes from{ {Wytheford}to{Muckleton}is nearly finished.It will take two years to finish all of the footpaths.The{tools that they use are spades,forks,pick- axes,hammers,nails and brushing hooks. The Venture Scouts help too. The longest walk is about six miles around Muckelton and Edgebolton.There will be fifteen walks around Shawbury.
